name: Favorite Vegan Bolognese - Super Simple!
description: The BEST Vegan Bolognese sauce and it's super simple to make with only 8 ingredients. Savory, meaty and hearty, everyone will love this Italian classic made vegan!
recipeIngredient: 2 tablespoons low sodium soy sauce (*use tamari for gluten free)
1 jar your favorite marinara sauce (about 3 cups) (divided)
1 block firm or extra-firm tofu (14-16 oz)
8 ounces spaghetti noodles or other pasta (*gluten free if needed)

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 375 degrees F and line a large baking sheet with parchment paper or spray well with oil.
recipeInstructions.name: Preheat oven to 375 degrees F and line a large baking sheet with parchment paper or spray well with oil.

recipeInstructions.text: In a large bowl, stir together the soy sauce, 2 tablespoons of the marinara sauce (adjust if doubling/halving the recipe), olive oil, smoked paprika, garlic powder and onion powder until well combined.
recipeInstructions.name: In a large bowl, stir together the soy sauce, 2 tablespoons of the marinara sauce (adjust if doubling/halving the recipe), olive oil, smoked paprika, garlic powder and onion powder until well combined.

recipeInstructions.text: Now drain the tofu from the package, pat with paper towels and crumble into the bowl with the sauce. You can use your hands OR use a potato masher to mash it right in the bowl.
recipeInstructions.name: Now drain the tofu from the package, pat with paper towels and crumble into the bowl with the sauce. You can use your hands OR use a potato masher to mash it right in the bowl.

recipeInstructions.text: Stir to coat the tofu crumbles in the sauce, then transfer to the prepared baking sheet, spreading it out into a layer (see photos above for visual reference). Bake in the center rack of the oven for 25-40 minutes, until chewy and golden in spots, but be careful not to burn it. You can give it a stir halfway, if the edges start to burn.
recipeInstructions.name: Stir to coat the tofu crumbles in the sauce, then transfer to the prepared baking sheet, spreading it out into a layer (see photos above for visual reference). Bake in the center rack of the oven for 25-40 minutes, until chewy and golden in spots, but be careful not to burn it. You can give it a stir halfway, if the edges start to burn.

recipeInstructions.text: While the tofu is baking, cook your pasta according to package instructions, then drain and set aside.
recipeInstructions.name: While the tofu is baking, cook your pasta according to package instructions, then drain and set aside.

recipeInstructions.text: Add the rest of the marinara sauce to a medium sized pot and warm on low heat. Once the tofu is done baking, remove it from the oven and add to the pot with the marinara. Stir to make a meaty bolognese sauce!
recipeInstructions.name: Add the rest of the marinara sauce to a medium sized pot and warm on low heat. Once the tofu is done baking, remove it from the oven and add to the pot with the marinara. Stir to make a meaty bolognese sauce!

recipeInstructions.text: Serve immediately over pasta, sprinkled with vegan parmesan, if desired, and some crusty bread. Enjoy!
